extendedInfo.description: theScore is your home for the NFL season!The Best Sports App. Ever! theScore has been completely re-built from the ground up for Android to give you the ultimate mobile sports experience. It is the must-have utility for sports fans.The league scores widget is back! Get your top 5 leagues' scores in a widget right on your home screen.â¢ We've got a faster, more fluid experience, real-time alerts to keep you in the action and the deepest fantasy sports tools so you can follow along with all of your teams and players in any league.â¢ theScore for Android - Brings you live sports scores and news from the biggest leagues in the world including: NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAA Football & Basketball, MMA (UFC & Bellator), CFL, PGA, NASCAR, F1 & more!â¢ NEW Breaking News Alerts - Get the biggest breaking news from all of your favorite leagues including the NFL, NBA, NHL and MLB with our all new breaking news alerts. These will be enabled when you access the news section for the corresponding league. You can turn these on or off easily under "Settings".â¢ NEW Off Season Trackers - Never miss a signing or trade with our all new transaction trackers.â¢ theScore provides up-to-the-second sports scores, box scores, stats, betting odds, game previews, recaps, top news stories, schedules and league standings.â¢ Receive FREE Push Alerts including: goals, ends of quarters/periods and key moments in any game to keep you on top of the action; anytime-anywhere.â¢ Install theScore's MyScore or theScore League Ticker Widgets - to get all of your sports scores from your followed teams or top 5 leagues even more conveniently right on your home screen! theScore League Score widget is also lock screen compatible for Jelly Bean 4.2+ devices. â¢ One-tap social sharing: Tweet or share on Facebook the latest team news, or a high-quality screenshot from any section of the app.â¢ We're introducing the NEW "My Score" area to customize the app to your needs. Follow any team throughout the season to view their performances as they happen in one area. â¢ Check out the NEW "Player Card Profiles" where you can do in-depth research with player photos, recent performances, season stats, bio and recent fantasy news via Rotowire.â¢ Catch up with the social chatter with interactive live blogs / live chats or key tweets for key matchups. Complete scores and news coverage includes:- Football (NFL, NCAA, CFL)- Basketball (NBA, NCAA Men's / Women's - including March Madness)- Hockey (NHL)- Baseball (MLB)- Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC, Bellator)- Soccer (EPL / Premier League, Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS)- Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1)- Golf (PGA)- Tennis (ATP Men's, WTA Women's)Get the best sports app ever. Get theScore!â¢ Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates and to provide product feedback: http://twitter.com/theScoreAppâ¢ For more information and other apps visit: http://mobile.theScore.com â¢ If you're experiencing any issues at all or have feedback, drop us a line, we'd be happy to help you out: thescoreapp@thescore.comtheScore is available on OS 2.3 and above. Also works in portrait for all Android tablets, full tablet support in landscape is coming very soon.--We are affiliated with theScore.com.

reviews.title: Best Free Sports App
reviews.comment: As a Hugh Formula 1 fan, I appreciate that they have included the drivers points standings, schedule, news and even live lap by lap leaderboard. Nice job!
reviews.author: Gerry McCracken

reviews.title: Very responsive!
reviews.comment: Simple and quick. Those are the two most important features of a sports score app. This one is just that...but sure could do without the advertising! I WOULD PAY FOR AN ADD FREE VERSION! PLEASE!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: Battery hog!  I used to love the old app. New one is horrible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly Good
reviews.comment: I like all the features, but it has one glitch on my phone.  It will ALWAYS reset the league settings to default.  After placing NHL, MLS, Champions League as favorites, they get re shuffled.  I found this happens after accessing the main page from the widget, and after an update.  Please fix. 2013-09-08 - Same problem still exists. Also, there is no CFL player information (stats, etc.)
reviews.author: Michael Schmidt

reviews.title: 2nd rate app
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app about one hour ago.  Upon randomly clicking on thr Chicago White Sox the app told me that reliever Jessee Crain was on their 60 Day DL.  The only thing wrong with that is that Jesse Crain was traded to Tampa Bay at the non-waive trading deadline nearly 6 weeks ago.
reviews.author: Charles Beauchamp

reviews.title: Wish there\'s an ad free version & MLB logos
reviews.comment: The only thing I don\'t like with this app is they don\'t have MLB logos. I don\'t know why. I hope you guys release an ad free version. You guys have the best scores app on the Android platform. Keep it up and please release an ad free version.
reviews.author: Charles Cerdenia

reviews.title: Best so far.
reviews.comment: But needs resizable widgets, transparency options and more widget choices to be an app that I actually use and not an app that\'s just installed.
reviews.author: Derek Ovenshire

reviews.title: MLB logos
reviews.comment: For the love of god please add mlb logos and you get five stars
reviews.author: Evan Longoria

reviews.title: Good app, but...
reviews.comment: ...would be even better if a myScore account option was implemented where users could track teams and enable alerts across all devices via one login. It is a shame you have to setup alerts each time you get a new device. A login like ESPN uses for ScoreCenter is the way to go.
reviews.author: Peter Katsiris

reviews.title: Better notification linking
reviews.comment: Looks like when I\'ll click a notification about an NFL news story, it doesn\'t open the NFL news section but just opens whatever news section was open last.
reviews.author: Francis Adelsberger

reviews.title: epic app
reviews.comment: Great app, no issues.  I would like to see scores for high school football.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CHICKENSURFER
reviews.comment: Definetely one of the Top Sports Apps out there. Everything you need to keep up to date with all the Scores in almost all leagues. Widget could use some upgrading and some new features added but overall the Score app is really good. A must have for all sports fanatics and anybody betting . :)
reviews.author: Steve B.

reviews.title: Proper tablet support at last!
reviews.comment: Love the new interface for ScoreMobile. Well designed with a modern look, and loaded with all the features you need for on the go.  Widget looks great too. Thank you for listening to your users and putting together a great new version of the best sports app on Android!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash Frenzy
reviews.comment: Used to love this app just. It crashed 7 times in the fourth qtr of monday night football... disappointing.
reviews.author: Arthur Diochon

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Quick and easy to use but all the adds kill the experience too bad
reviews.author: victor sanchez

reviews.title: Really solid
reviews.comment: Quick, reliable and accurate. Updated regularly. My go to app for scores, and the betting lines. Widget is great too. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Will Law

reviews.title: Outstanding.
reviews.comment: One of the best apps. Truly user friendly. Love the black background.
reviews.author: Ka Ramos

reviews.title: Play-by-play is Incredible!
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t just give you the scoring plays. It gives you EVERY... SINGLE... PLAY!
reviews.author: Noah Gregory
